Title: A Little Off the Top
Description:
Ever seen a deepstrider before? This one sure ain't happy to see us. Made quick work of the shredders that made it past the moles. Real shame, those pilots are gonna have to work overtime to pay off the damages.

Now if someone were to take care of it and bring back something as proof, well, I'm sure there'd be a nice payday.
ObjectivesText: Slay Alhainr and collect its skull.
PortraitGiverText: Alhainr was here long before Opportunity Point. Some say he was here before the earthen.
RewardText: This is bad, real bad! You'd think killin' something would make it less dangerous. We're getting stomped!
